title: Pizza, beer emerge winners in India as FIFA World Cup follows cricket
content: “The long sporting season is boosting sales of pizza and alcoholic beverages,” Rajendra Wadher, director at PRB Securities Ltd., said by phone. “India’s young population with high disposable incomes are turning to social drinking and fast food. Occupancy at restaurants is higher than usual during the matches.”
